images.name: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone
images.tagline: The rebuild of the groundbreaking giant robot anime

images.name: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-
images.overview: After concluding their talks with Crusch, Subaru and Emilia return to the village of Arlam, intending to report to Roswaal and discuss what to do next. But they find Arlam deserted and learn that the villagers who had taken refuge in the Sanctuary with Ram have not yet returned. When Subaru and Emilia arrive back at Roswaal’s mansion to find out where the Sanctuary is, they are greeted by Frederica, a young woman who used to work as one of Roswaal’s maids.
images.latestImage: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- - Season 2 Episode 2

images.name: Pretty Boy Detective Club
images.tagline: Season 1 Episode 5 - 'The Swindler, the Vanishing Man, and the Pretty Boys (Part 2)'
images.overview: Nagahiro loses to Lai, but the Pretty Boy Detective Club figures out the trick that Lai used to win. In order to battle Lai again, they sneak into the Reasonable Doubt Casino. But at the moment of the showdown, the detectives are met with an unexpected situation! What will be the outcome of the battle between the rival middle schools?
images.latestImage: Pretty Boy Detective Club - Season 1 Episode 5

episode.name: The Swindler, the Vanishing Man, and the Pretty Boys (Part 2)

images.name: Pretty Boy Detective Club
images.tagline: Season 1 Episode 10 - 'The Pretty Boy on D. Hill (Part 1)'
images.overview: The student council elections are coming up at Yubiwa Academy Middle School, and Wana Naganawa, the current student council vice-president and leading presidential candidate, is forced to withdraw her candidacy after becoming the victim of a hit-and-run accident. The Pretty Boy Detective Club sense that there is a conspiracy behind the elections and begin their search for the suspect. They set up Mayumi as a new candidate to run in the elections but...
images.latestImage: Pretty Boy Detective Club - Season 1 Episode 10

episode.name: The Pretty Boy on D. Hill (Part 1)

images.name: Kill la Kill
images.overview: Ryuko's rampage continues, and thanks to Ragyo and Nui she has an unexpected new ally. With Satsuki as the target, will the Elite Four and Nudist Beach be able to withstand the onslaught?
